snippet: A YouTube introduction to college, a regulator rebuffs Obama on plans to reduce borrowers' mortgage debt, complaints about the brakes in the 2013 Infiniti JX35 and other consumer-focused news in today's Times.

headline.main: Wednesday Reading: A YouTube Introduction to College
